summary: PURCHASED VEHICLE 1/29/99.  BEGAN EXPERIENCING DANGEROUS SHAKING AND VIBRATION DURING BREAKING AROUND 20000 MILES. ON 9/15/00 REPLACED BRAKE PADS AND ROTORS AT 29503 MILES.  SHAKING AND VIBRATION DURING RESUMED.  REPLACED ROTORS AT 48532 MILES ON 11/14/01.  DANGEROUS SHAKING AND VIBRATION RESUMED DURING BREAKING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS, OFTEN RESULTING IN DIFFICULTY CONTROLLING THE VEHICLE.  AT 68918 MILES REPLACED BRAKE PADS, ROTORS, AND CALIPERS ON 6/12/03.   *JB
